meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Growth Slows in Quarter Economic growth has slowed to its weakest pace in four years. Gross domestic product grew 1.3 percent in the first quarter, about half the rate of the previous quarter.
Japan War Victims' Cases Fail Japan's highest court denied compensation to wartime sex slaves and forced laborers from China but acknowledged the coercion.
Under Fire, Actor Hits Back Alec Baldwin, assailed after his tirade to his young daughter, goes on the offensive. The TV Watch by Alessandra Stanley.

A New Perspective on Iraq In ''At the Center of the Storm,'' George J. Tenet, the former C.I.A. director, says he doubts that weapons of mass destruction were the principal cause of the decision to go to war with Iraq. Michiko Kakutani's review.
Inner Journeys A visit to the pyramids in Egypt is one of a growing number of New Age-style package trips to sacred sites around the world that focus on the spiritual.
Growth Slows in Quarter Economic growth has slowed to its weakest pace in four years. Gross domestic product grew 1.3 percent in the first quarter, about half the rate of the previous quarter.
Japan War Victims' Cases Fail Japan's highest court denied compensation to wartime sex slaves and forced laborers from China but acknowledged the coercion.
Under Fire, Actor Hits Back Alec Baldwin, assailed after his tirade to his young daughter, goes on the offensive. The TV Watch by Alessandra Stanley.

A New Perspective on Iraq In ''At the Center of the Storm,'' George J. Tenet, the former C.I.A. director, says he doubts that weapons of mass destruction were the principal cause of the decision to go to war with Iraq. Michiko Kakutani's review.
Inner Journeys A visit to the pyramids in Egypt is one of a growing number of New Age-style package trips to sacred sites around the world that focus on the spiritual.
